Player History
Drafted in 21st round, 330th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/6/2015, off Maximo Sevilla (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/2015, off Benjamin Martinez (BOS)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2015, hitting .402 with 4 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2015, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago on 8/26/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2016, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2016, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2017, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
9/5/2017: Signed a contract extension with Brooklyn, $3,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Chicago on 9/19/2017...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2018, hitting .464 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 3/7/2019.
Released by Houston on 4/1/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 5/26/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $704,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Colorado on 7/16/2019.
